mapper.select: SELECT q.*, c.course_name as courseName, u.real_name as studentName FROM course_qa q LEFT JOIN course_info c ON q.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON q.student_id = u.id ORDER BY q.status ASC, q.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE course_qa SET reply = #{reply}, status = 1, reply_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
